data.name: RCFV_Reader
data.description: RCFV reader is a new software to quickly calculate normalised relative compositional frequency variability.

evidence: "RCFV Reader is a new software to quickly calculate normalised relative compositional frequency variability."
"Welcome to RCFV Reader. RCFV Reader accepts FASTA files as input, and then outputs 6 files." and description of output files containing RCFV and nRCFV values for datasets, characters, and taxa.
Usage is shown as running a Perl script directly: "perl RCFVReader.pl dna <filename> <prefix for output files>" with no mention of package managers or releases, implying source-based distribution.
